price: “Adaba keessan dhandhamaa, kun ka isa jarjarsiifachaa turtani ” (isaaniin jedhama).
arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhūqū fit'natakum hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tastaʿjilūna
